cfg

Class ControlFlowGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • cfg.ControlFlowGraph

  • public class ControlFlowGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the Control Flow Graph for a given function from the AST. It can run unreachable code optimisation.
    Author:
    Joe Godbehere, Ricky Ratnayake, Craig Sketchley

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlFlowGraph(Function function)
      Construct a CFG based on a given function

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Function convertToFunction() 
      java.util.List<Node> dfs(boolean forward) 
      java.util.List<Node> getAllNodes()
      Returns the list of all the nodes within the CFG.
      void removeNode(Node inNode)
      Given a node, remove the node from this CFG.
      void removeUnreachableCode()
      This optimisation attempts to remove any unreachable code, using a DFS
      java.lang.String toString()
      String representation of the CFG, suitable for use with graphviz.
